Maintaining cardiorespiratory fitness can reduce a patients risk for developing bronchiectasis later in life.

articles.author: Josh Breslow
articles.title: All capacity restrictions to be lifted in Nashville, indoor mask mandate will remain - WKRN News 2
articles.description: All capacity restrictions in Nashville put in place amid the pandemic will be lifted in mid-May with the city’s indoor mask mandate remaining in effect, according to Metro health officials.
